page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: There are two nursery schools in our block and both of these form part of a primary school. There are seven primary schools in our block, three of which are built to the same design. One of the seven primary schools is Headwell, which is for handicapped children. There is one Roman Catholic primary school in Dunfermline. At the age of twelve its pupils go to the Catholic High School, St. Columba's, which is also in our block. There are two other high schools in our block, to which pupils transfer after seven years at primary school. After four years at High School, pupils sit 'O' Level examinations and then 'A' level examinations. Some pupils go on to tertiary education.
